body:
Thank you all very much for helping me out to get to 500 subscribers I really appreciate you guys highly. As a result I'm going to release 2 packs that I use - they are not mine I just use them because they're beautiful :). Here is the video with both packs and if you enjoy the video or enjoy the pack be sure to give me a like it would help - thanks!

P.S Shoutout to ImRaging - a long time ago he gave me this private pack and I was the first person (I think I was correct me if I'm wrong raging xD) to use it and I've had it ever since so be sure to thank him if you ever see him around :).

Make sure to watch it in the best definition (720-1080p) :)


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W7yE73IaHhQ&feature=youtu.be
